stimulusHtml: Which of the following preconditions for the method is most appropriate to avoid an  ArithmeticException?

features.html:
The following code segment appears in a method. In the code segment,  y  is an  int  variable.

 

int x = 5 / y;
System.out.println(x);

choicesHtml: /** Precondition: y is equal to 0. */
/** Precondition: y is less than 5. */
/** Precondition: y is not equal to 0. */
/** Precondition: y is not negative. */
